title: pixel 3 4k video only show as 1080 in imovie on mac, filmora on windows can not export (empty file)
content:
when editing 4k video on my mac, the video project defaults to 1080. the video file has 4k resolution and is the first/only media file that is added to the project/timeline.

on windows, i'm using filmora and the editing works fine, but when i try to export as 4k, the file is always 3036kb and empty.

do i have to convert the pixel video first?

thanks
frank
